patterns.name: Crochet Mommy and Me Messy Bun Hats

pattern_sources.author: Megan-Anne Llama & Jacquline Cappuccino
pattern_sources.name: Lattes and Llamas
pattern_sources.notes:
Welcome to *[Lattes and Llamas][1]* Geek-A-Long (GAL) pattern store on Ravelry. Here you will find all of the released squares and other free patterns. If you're looking for Lattes and Llamas other crochet or knit patterns you can find them [here][2].

The Geek-A-Long is a year-long charity knit along aimed at raising awareness for Child's Play charity. To learn more about Child's Play or the GAL, please visit our [group on Ravelry][4] or our [FAQ page][5]. 


  [1]: http://www.lattesandllamas.com
  [2]: http://www.ravelry.com/patterns/sources/lattes-and-llamas-ravelry-store/patterns
  [4]: http://www.ravelry.com/groups/geek-along
  [5]: http://lattesandllamas.com/geek-a-week-faq/

pattern_sources.name: Olena Huffmire Designs
pattern_sources.notes:
If you're new here, my name is Olena and I design, write, and record crochet pattern tutorials for creatives just like you! Helping you WOW your community.

★ FOLLOW ME HERE for more crochet patterns★

FREE Patterns Website: http://bit.ly/2vvb1l0
Ravelry http://bit.ly/2f9ZIaY
Pinterest http://bit.ly/2wnN0ZG
Instagram http://bit.ly/2w8of4j
Facebook http://bit.ly/2vqUjCF
Twitter http://bit.ly/2umgANM

pattern_sources.notes: Editor's note: Many of these patterns have been made unavailable without being marked on the pattern page next to the source.

pattern_sources.notes: Lots of changes going on at the JoAnn website. Projects are being moved and removed constantly. Some items may be later found at the Simplicity website.
